34 PROCESS_THREAD(uileds_process)
35 {
36  static etimer_t et;
37 
38  PROCESS_BEGIN();
39 
40  etimer_start(&et, TIMESTAMP_TICKS_PER_SEC/50, PROCESS_THIS(), PROCESS_EVENT_TIMEOUT, NULL);
41 
42  while(1)
43  {
44  PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT_UNTIL(etimer_expired(&et));
45 
46  do{
47  uileds_handler();
48  etimer_reset(&et);
49  }while(etimer_expired(&et));
50  }
51 
52  PROCESS_END();
53 }
